articles.author: BERNARD CONDON
articles.title: Musk's next task? Reviving Tesla in Europe where sales have plunged by more than half in a year - Yahoo Finance
articles.description: Tesla sales plunged by more than half last month in several European countries in a sign that Elon Musk could struggle to revive the company after he shifts ...
articles.content: NEW YORK (AP) Tesla sales plunged by more than half last month in several European countries in a sign that Elon Musk could struggle to revive the company after he shifts from his Washington work to … [+2516 chars]
